title: France panorama. [No. 70/32]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - France
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture producers and directors - France
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The French track and field championships - At the Colombes Olympic Stadium, near Paris, good performances turned in by the French athletes. 2. Underneath Place de L'Etoile - underneath the Arch of Triumph, the new tunnel. 3. Today's movie-makers - Francois Truffaud's new film: "The Child of the Wilderness". 4. The Avignon Festival - the Dramatic Arts Festival of Avignon has just taken place. 5. Music, first and foremost - in Aix-en Provence, the Music Festival has started with Herbert Von Karajan.
